full_output.summary: A Passionate undergraduate computer science student from SRM University with a strong passion for developing innovative software solutions. capable in a number of programming languages, such as Java, C, Python, C++, and JavaScript. Eager to leverage my skills in a Technical Consultant role to solve real-world business problems using next-gen technologies.

projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: Developed a computerized hotel management system using C programming language. Implemented features for instant room booking, managing vacancies, check-ins, and check-outs.

projects.name: Virtual Voice assistant
projects.description: Developed a Python-based virtual voice assistant integrating Google Maps, application management and much more, demonstrating proficiency in Python and user-friendly software design.

projects.name: Grocery Store management System
projects.description: Developed a C++ system for grocery store operations in Object Oriented Approach, focusing on efficient record-keeping, inventory tracking, and profit calculation.

projects.name: ATM Simulation System
projects.description: Developed a secure and functional ATM simulation system using Java, showcasing proficiency in secure system design and user-friendly interfaces.

projects.name: Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time Chat Application using MERN(MongoDB,Express JS, React and Node JS) Stack for easy and seamless user experience and efficient Data exchange.

full_output.name: Krishna Varshita Borra
